name: Bubble Trouble (itch) (JJMT)
description:
BUBBLE TROUBLE

This is a quick, polished little prototype of something ive being pondering over. Time to see what people think!

Bubble Trouble is a relaxing, swiping puzzle game about defending your home from invading bubbles by popping them, but watch out! you only have 6 moves and 3 health to do it. Pop all invaders to succeed to the next level.

--PLAY IN FULL SCREEN for best quality (expand icon on the bottom right)--

Please read the information below (no time to make tutorials unfortunately)

  • Click and release with your mouse in a Swipe motion to move the player (like a smartphone)
  • You lose HP when you pop an invader
  • You use up a Move whenever you move to a different space
  • Moving beyond the home bubble (3x3 grid) causes you to Orbit around to the other side, using no Moves and heals your HP back to 3., you even pop any invader you hit for free! This can only be done Once. (shown via the green orbiting icon)
  • 0 HP doesn't mean you die instead, you have 1 last chance to do damage. this could save the level from failure
  • 0 Moves while invaders remain, result in a loss

All Invader Types

CircleDiamondSquareTriangleDeals 1 damageDeals 1 damage
Deals 1 damage, Consumes an additional Move!IF your HP is above 0:
Deals 2 damage and pushes you back but doesn't use a Move!Fires a barrier bubble in your move direction, popping anything it hits but blocks you from moving through it!popping it via orbit allows you to orbit again!IF at 0 HP:
Deals NO damage!

My advice is to just go for it, levels restart instantly so you'll learn what things do naturally and as fast as you want. There isn't anything beside the bare bones, core gameplay loop at this moment. Hope you enjoy, do leave feedback!
